calling topics"}]},"e320250ab1ad4ef781217a36b50fb09f":{"id":"e320250ab1ad4ef781217a36b50fb09f","stepType":"TextOutput","name":"Incident created","value":{"value":"(function execute() {
 return gs.getMessage("Alright, I've opened your incident and a technician will be assigned.");

","mode":"script"},"applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"},"secure":false},"3a7ab72349fc48a2a7d22af7721e5fee":{"id":"3a7ab72349fc48a2a7d22af7721e5fee","stepType":"RecordOutput","name":"Display incident","variableId":"9140d9984249486e9b074fe6998ff9c6","mode":"script","tableName":"incident","fields":["short_description","state","priority","category","assignment_group","description"],"applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"},"condition":{"mode":"glide_query","value":"sys_id={{vaVars.inc_sysid}}"},"cardTemplate":"General","cardFields":{},"cardDefinition":{"name":"Record","value":"General"}},"9020b2d1a5ef496e97e7ed65bf4bca9a":{"id":"9020b2d1a5ef496e97e7ed65bf4bca9a","name":"Create Request/Incident","script":"(function execute() {
 var caller = vaInputs.caller;
 var short_desc = vaInputs.short_description;
 var urgency = vaInputs.urgency;
 var desc = vaInputs.description;
 var cmdb_ci = vaInputs.cmdb_ci;

 if (!gs.nil(caller) && !gs.nil(short_desc)) {
 var incDetails = new sn_itsm_va.VACreateINCUtil().createIncident(caller, short_desc, urgency, desc, cmdb_ci);
 vaVars.inc_sysid = incDetails.sysid;
 }
 
})()","stepType":"ScriptAction","applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"}},"a0c29449c76c4710a71b9ede51cf72d5":{"id":"a0c29449c76c4710a71b9ede51cf72d5","name":"Check UR created","script":"(function execute() {
 var incGr = new GlideRecord("incident");
 incGr.get(vaVars.inc_sysid);
 vaVars.is_UR_created = !gs.nil(incGr.universal_request);
})()
","stepType":"ScriptAction","applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"}},"a1a703afb8db4d2caf0b04c610f30d16":{"id":"a1a703afb8db4d2caf0b04c610f30d16","stepType":"Decision","name":"Decision"},"8de2114d869045d0b7358d9c6868b210":{"id":"8de2114d869045d0b7358d9c6868b210","stepType":"TextOutput","name":"Request created","value":{"value":"(function execute() {
 return gs.getMessage("Got it. I submitted your request and someone will be assigned to it soon.");
})()
","mode":"script"},"applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"},"secure":false},"b273fdf22cd340e2a355ecd5ed15929b":{"id":"b273fdf22cd340e2a355ecd5ed15929b","stepType":"ScriptOutput","name":"Display Request","output_type":"single_part","script":"(function execute() {
 var itsm_helper = new sn_itsm_va.ItsmVaHelper();
 var gr = new GlideRecord("incident");
 gr.get(vaVars.inc_sysid);

 var title = gr.getElement("universal_request").getLabel();
 var eff_no = gr.getValue("task_effective_number");
 var link = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri') + gs.getProperty('sn_itsm_va.com.snc.itsm.virtualagent.portal_url') + '?sys_id=' + vaVars.inc_sysid + '&id=ticket&table=incident';
 var table_name = gr.getClassDisplayValue();
 var priority = gr.getDisplayValue('priority');
 var short_description = gr.getValue('short_description');
 var description = gr.getValue('description');
 var state = gr.getDisplayValue('state');
 var category = gr.getDisplayValue('category');
 var assignment_group = gr.getDisplayValue('assignment_group');
 var fields = [];
 if (short_description != null && short_description != '')
 fields.push({ "fieldLabel": gr.getElement("short_description").getLabel(), "fieldValue": short_description });
 if (state != null && state != '')
 fields.push({ "fieldLabel": gr.getElement("state").getLabel(), "fieldValue": state });
 if (priority != null && priority != '')
 fields.push({ "fieldLabel": gr.getElement("priority").getLabel(), "fieldValue": priority });
 if (category != null && category != '')
 fields.push({ "fieldLabel": gr.getElement("category").getLabel(), "fieldValue": category });
 if (assignment_group != null && assignment_group != '')
 fields.push({ "fieldLabel": gr.getElement("assignment_group").getLabel(), "fieldValue": assignment_group });
 if (description != null && description != '')
 fields.push({ "fieldLabel": gr.getElement("description").getLabel(), "fieldValue": description });

 var data = JSON.stringify({
 "title": title,
 "fields": fields,
 "subtitle": eff_no,
 "url": link

 });
 return vaSystem.renderCard("Card", data);

})()

","applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"}},"0df37e37461644bf9ec14a2d218e895b":{"id":"0df37e37461644bf9ec14a2d218e895b","name":"Attach incident record to conversation","script":"(function execute() {
 vaSystem.attachRecordToConversation("incident", vaVars.inc_sysid);
})()

})()
"},"label":"No"},{"id":"bfccc811f7c645fdb6ff15c570e37323","edgeType":"Branch","source":"a1a703afb8db4d2caf0b04c610f30d16","target":"8de2114d869045d0b7358d9c6868b210","sourcePort":"","targetPort":"","expression":{"mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {

})()
"},"label":"Yes"},{"id":"3bc7291c5613498ca1b98aec45e48884","edgeType":"Edge","source":"b273fdf22cd340e2a355ecd5ed15929b","target":"e7429f91be16405fb0f3135422864f26","sourcePort":"","targetPort":""},{"id":"62d1330b239e4644b93bacdd94d63269","edgeType":"Edge","source":"9020b2d1a5ef496e97e7ed65bf4bca9a","target":"0df37e37461644bf9ec14a2d218e895b","sourcePort":"","targetPort":""},{"id":"17f49dd0b92c495abb387528cf0051a2","edgeType":"Edge","source":"0df37e37461644bf9ec14a2d218e895b","target":"a0c29449c76c4710a71b9ede51cf72d5","sourcePort":"","targetPort":""}]}}}</graph><key_phrases/><library>true</library><live_agent>false</live_agent><name>Create Incident from Chat</name><nlu_intent/><nlu_intent_label/><nlu_model/><nlu_model_label/><nlu_provider/><palette_label/><roles/><source_topic_id>bd562ebd733333003ade8889faf6a777</source_topic_id><sys_class_name>sys_cb_topic</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-20 16:00:50</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>5b16ddafdb090110cd98f1be3b961960</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create Incident from Chat</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CI NLU - Krishna " source="8b09b863dbc50110cd98f1be3b96198c">8b09b863dbc50110cd98f1be3b96198c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CI NLU - Krishna ">8b09b863dbc50110cd98f1be3b96198c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_cb_topic_5b16ddafdb090110cd98f1be3b961960</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-20 16:00:50</sys_updated_on><triggerable_by_notification>false</triggerable_by_notification><type>TOPIC_BLOCK</type><variables/></sys_cb_topic><sys_variable_value action="delete_multiple" query="document_key=5b16ddafdb090110cd98f1be3b961960"/></record_update>
